"Context:
{'diseases': [{'disease': 'myeloproliferative neoplasm', 'associations': [{'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Variant rs1057519752', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Variant rs121913614', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Gene ATM', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Variant rs121913520', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Variant rs121913504', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Gene TERT', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Gene SH2B3', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Gene JAK2', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Gene RUNX1', 'provenance': None}], 'entity_info': {}}, {'disease': 'triple-receptor negative breast cancer', 'associations': [{'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Variant rs17215231', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Variant rs2464195', 'provenance': None}, {'predicate': 'associates', 'target': 'Variant rs78378222', 'provenance': None}], 'entity_info': {}}]}

The JSON contains a list of diseases, each with its own set of associations to other entities (e.g., genes, variants) and provenance information.
